Bug was updated by MakKos in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 08:19.

codio-6326 Create New File dialog - Flow Created by Ian Jobling
Flow is still showing as a file type users can work with..

Should be removed and replaced with Flode (.flode)
State QA ready → QA rejected
Got this in console on .flode type file open
mxClient.js:123 Synchronous XMLHttpRequest on the main thread is deprecated because of its detrimental effects to the end user's experience. For more help, check http://xhr.spec.whatwg.org/.
main.js:49 main.js - could not find version file, falling back to version 0.1.0
